uneconomic.translation[0].definitions[0]: not making enough money or profit
uneconomic.translation[1].definitions[0]: not making enough money or profit
Uneconomic coal mines will have to be closed.
Vast subsidies were going to uneconomic nationalized industries.
uneconomic.translation[1].definitions[1]: using too much effort, money, or materials
Firms find it uneconomic to keep opening up and shutting down.
